title: Do Not Disturb Makes No Noise for Starred Contacts
content:
I want to make it so that when my partner calls or text's me, it always rings/chimes. But for everyone else it is silent. 

I turned on Do Not Disturb, set "starred contacts only" and added my partner as a starred contact. 

At first, everyone's text came through even with do not disturb on!!! :(

Then I found in my messenger settings (using google messenger) that it was overriding Do Not Disturb. So I turned that off. 

Now, nobody's text's ring/chime/vibrate - including my starred contacts, even though I have told it to let them come through. 

I feel like I am going crazy - I am trying to do the exact thing this program is designed for, using only google apps and it's just not working. What am I missing?
